invoice_id.description: The invoice for the reminder. If set assumes all other fields are set to custom values, instead of filling them from the invoice. POSTing to invoices/:id/payment_reminders, automatically set this and all other fields.

address_field.description: Receiver address, shown in envelope window. Defaults to invoice.client.address_field if created from invoice.

date.description: Date the payment_reminder is issued. Automatically set when created from invoice. Defaults to today.

due_days.description: Used to calculate the due date of the payment_reminder. Useless if date and due date are present. Taken from settings when created from invoice

due_date.description: Auto-calculated from date + due days if empty and the payment_reminder is opened.

external_ref.description: Some external reference, whatever this may be.

title.description: The headline of a document. Use SK placeholders to prevent exessive typing e.g. 'Your payment_reminder [number]'. Defaults to values from settings

notes_before.description: Notes shown before the line items. Normaly contains salutation and other introductional information. SK placeholders can be used. Defaults to values from settings

notes_after.description: Notes shown after the line items. Can contain information about payments, bank account or a thank-you message. SK placeholders can be used. Defaults to values from settings

language.description: Should be a valid language short-code: de-DE, fr, en-GB; like defined in your account language menu. When the document is emailed or printed, a localized version of a multi-language template(email, pdf) will be used if available. Defaults to the clients language, if empty and a client is assigned.

archived_pdf.description: Archived PDF version of the document. Is created when an document is printed and archived. A document can have multiple archived versions. This only returns the most recent one.

client.description: The client for the document. Is assigned throught the related invoice

client_id.description: The clients uuid. Is assigned throught the related invoice.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set, only the team and its parent teams can see the record. Defaults to team id from invoice

line_items.description: Line items for the document. Defaults to invoice.gross_total and late fee values from settings

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards.

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

lock_version.description: Auto-incremented to prevent concurrent updateing. First save wins and increments version.

gross_total.description: DEPRECATED use net_total bcs there are no taxes applied

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

filter[tags].title: Tags
filter[tags].description: Filter by a space delimited list of tags

filter[from].title: From date
filter[from].description: All objects with a date after the date

filter[to].title: To date
filter[to].description: All objects with date before the date

filter[languages].title: Languages
filter[languages].description: A list of language codes, comma separated

filter[client_ids].title: Clients
filter[client_ids].description: A single or a list of client uuids, comma separated

filter[ids].title: Documents
filter[ids].description: A single or a list of document uuids, comma separated

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC

template_id.title: PDF template used for printing
template_id.description: UUID of a pdf template used to print the document. MUST be present

base64.title: Return the created pdf base64 encoded
base64.description: If set the new pdf is returned inside the attachment JSON within 'base64' key. Leave empty to save traffic.
